title: A true relation by Colonell Morgan, in a letter of the totall routing of the Lord Ashley, by him and Sir William Brereton at Stovv. With the names of all the prisoners by them taken. These being true copies and examined, are printed and published according to order of Parliament.
author: Morgan, Thomas, Sir, d. 1679?
publisher: Printed for Matthew Walbanck at Grays-Inne Gate.,
